A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: It's well made unlike the final chapter but boring characters\, unexplained levels of power\, the worst fall of a hero ever\, weak enemies all make this movie sad and pointless. Rey strolls to victory and never feels under pressure. A continuation from.the last 15 mins of the previous movie. The film that almost destroyed Star Wars\, not because it was badly put together or edited\, but because it feels like it is trying to annoy fans of the originals\, rather than keep them on board while bringing younger people on too.\nShould be re edited with extra shots of Rey training with Luke not a total loser.
